resources.string:
Guess the word in 6 tries!!

Each guess must be a valid 5-letter word. Click Enter to Submit.

After each guess, the tile colors will change to show how close your guess was to the actual word.
The letter {greenLet} is in the word and in the correct spot.
The letter {yellowLet} is in the word but in the wrong spot.
The letter {greyLet} is not in the word in any spot.
A new word will be available each time you play!
